title: dApp CDN schema
description: A schema for dapp CDN for dApp registry

logo.description: A URL to the logo of the dApp. Should be square and 512x512 in PNG format

banner.description: A URL to the banner of the dApp. Should be 1920x1080 and in PNG format

screenshots.description: A list of URLs to the screenshots of the dApp. Should be 1284 x 2778 and in PNG format
